```
version: '2'

services:
drone-server:
image: drone/drone:0.5
ports:
- 80:8000
volumes:
- ./drone:/var/lib/drone/
restart: always
environment:
- DRONE_OPEN=true
- DRONE_GITHUB=true
- DRONE_GITHUB_CLIENT=${DRONE_GITHUB_CLIENT}
- DRONE_GITHUB_SECRET=${DRONE_GITHUB_SECRET}
- DRONE_SECRET=${DRONE_SECRET}

drone-agent:
image: drone/drone:0.5
command: agent
restart: always
depends_on: [ drone-server ]
volumes:
- /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
environment:
- DRONE_SERVER=ws://drone-server:8000/ws/broker
- DRONE_SECRET=${DRONE_SECRET}
```

```
debug: true
pipeline:
 build:
 image: node
 commands:
 - npm install --development
 - npm test
```

```
debug: true
pipeline:
  build:
    image: node
    commands:
      - npm install --development
      - npm test

    gcr:
      repo: myrepo/node-example-drone
      token: >
         {

         }
```

```
   username: drone
```
